divs: sighting detailson 10\8\01 about 0550 am while driving onthe belt pkwy. west we have seen avery fast flying object .the object was flying from nw to se.the object had 3blue lights and was flying about 6 times faster then any jet liner taking offfrom jfk airport.the sighting was for few seconds only.please limit yournarrative to 500 words (equivalent to 1 typed page).
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
